S04bsu012_u:2: oṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya / namo bhagavate bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabharājāya tathāgatāya //
S04bsu012_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālī mahānagarī tenānuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu012_u:5_0: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
S04bsu012_u:5_1: sārdham aṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiś ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā
S04bsu012_u:6_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīr dharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanād ekaṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu012_u:6_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu012_u:6_2: bhagavantam etad avocat - deśayatu bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāmāni,
S04bsu012_u:8: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānām anugraham upādāya /
S04bsu012_u:9: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S04bsu012_u:12: nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya /
S04bsu012_u:13: tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye /
S04bsu012_u:14: evaṃ bhagavan, iti mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu012_u:16: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:17_0: tatra bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu012_u:17_1: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś ca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu012_u:18: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāny abhūvan /
S04bsu012_u:20: prathamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
S04bsu012_u:21: tadā mama śarīraprabhayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇā lokadhātavo bhrājeraṃs tapyeran viroceran /
S04bsu012_u:25: (dvitīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
S04bsu012_u:26: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇir iva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:27: vipulakāyas tadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:28: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāś ca,
S04bsu012_u:31: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca) karmāṇi kurvīran //
S04bsu012_u:33: yadāham anāgate - - - - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātor akṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:34: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt //
S04bsu012_u:35: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpto 'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāś ca,
S04bsu012_u:36: te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran //
S04bsu012_u:37: pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:40: mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt //
S04bsu012_u:41_0: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca
S04bsu012_u:41_1: me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā
S04bsu012_u:41_2: andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:42: te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu012_u:43_0: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya
S04bsu012_u:43_1: ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā
S04bsu012_u:46: nīrogāś ca nirupadravāś ca te syur yāva bodhiparyavasānam //
S04bsu012_u:47_0: aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā yaḥ kaścin mātṛgrāmo
S04bsu012_u:47_1: nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo
S04bsu012_u:48: tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam //
S04bsu012_u:49_0: navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpte 'haṃ
S04bsu012_u:49_2: vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam //
S04bsu012_u:50: daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:51: ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhir upadrutā vimānitāś ca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:52: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran //
S04bsu012_u:53_0: ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya
S04bsu012_u:53_1: ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t)
S04bsu012_u:54: te mam nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ, ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam //
S04bsu012_u:55: dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ
S04bsu012_u:62: imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān //
S04bsu012_u:63_0: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu012_u:63_1: yat praṇidhānaṃ yac ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tan na śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum /
S04bsu012_u:64: suviśuddhaṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ vyapagataśilāśarkarakaṭhalyam apagatakāmadoṣam apagatāpāyaduḥkhaśabdam apagatamātṛgrāmam /
S04bsu012_u:67: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣām aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau,
S04bsu012_u:70: yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ /
S04bsu012_u:71: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam //
S04bsu012_u:72: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma - santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:74: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam,
S04bsu012_u:76: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate /
S04bsu012_u:77: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:78: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayam eva na paribhuñjanti,
S04bsu012_u:82: te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaś cyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā /
S04bsu012_u:83: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
S04bsu012_u:84: tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)mukhībhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:85: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataś cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante, jātismarāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:86: te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhir arthikā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:87: dānābhiratāś ca bhaviṣyanti dānasya ca varṇavādinaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:88: sarvam api parityāgenānupūrveṇa karacaraṇaśīrṣanayanaṃ ca māṃsaśoṇitaṃ (ca)
S04bsu012_u:90: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
S04bsu012_u:96: na ca tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ gambhīram artham ājānanti /
S04bsu012_u:100: mārapakṣikās te tādṛḥā mohapuruṣāḥ svayaṃ kumārgapratipannāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:102: teṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhena narakavāsagatir bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:104: yais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ ḥrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:105: teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ sumukhībhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:106: te tataḥ cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāḥayāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:107: te gṛhān utsṛjya tathāgataḥāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti //
S04bsu012_u:108: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:110: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:111: te anekavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena tataś cyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapadyante /
S04bsu012_u:112: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu012_u:116: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:118: tīkṣṇendriyāś ca bhaviṣyanti paṇḍitā vyaktā meghāvinaś ca /
S04bsu012_u:123: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti /
S04bsu012_u:124: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalam abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
S04bsu012_u:125: anyonyam ahitakāmā nityaṃ parasparam anarthāya parākrāmanti /
S04bsu012_u:126: te ca vanadevatām āvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca /
S04bsu012_u:130: tasya śatror nāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:131: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:133: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāś ca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ //
S04bsu012_u:134: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ etāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:135: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsam upavasanti,
S04bsu012_u:136: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:137: yeṣām evaṃpraṇidhānam evamabhiprāyam - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitāyus tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu012_u:138: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:139: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti,
S04bsu012_u:143: kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate, na ca durgatigamanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:144: te tataś cyutvā iha manuṣyaloke upapatsyante /
S04bsu012_u:146: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:147: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante /
S04bsu012_u:148: te rūpasaṃpannāś ca bhaviṣyanti, eśvaryasaṃpannāś ca bhaviṣyanti, parivārasaṃpannāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:149: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:150: tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ //
S04bsu012_u:151_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantam etad avocat - ahaṃ bhagavan paścime
S04bsu012_u:151_1: kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca tasya bhagavato
S04bsu012_u:152: antaśaḥ svapnāntaram api buddhanāmakaṃ karṇapuṭeṣu upasaṃhārayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu012_u:153: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu012_u:157: tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam /
S04bsu012_u:160: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:162: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:163: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:165: na teṣāṃ kenacit śakyamojo 'pahartum, hṛtaṃ vā ojaḥ punar api pratisaṃharati /
S04bsu012_u:166: bhagavān āha - etam etad mañjuśrīḥ, evam etat, yathā vadasi /
S04bsu012_u:167: yaś ca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:170_0: śucinā śucim āhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite
S04bsu012_u:172: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni /
S04bsu012_u:174: yaṃ cetayati, yaṃ prārthayati, taṃ sarvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayati /
S04bsu012_u:175: yadi dirgham āyuḥ kāmayate, dirghāyuṣko bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:177: yadi aiśvaryam abhiprārthayate, tad alpakṛcchreṇa prāpnoti / yadi putrābhilāṣī
S04bsu012_u:180: yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā,
S04bsu012_u:182: tais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu012_u:188: yeṣāṃ corabhayaṃ taskarabhayam, tais tasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā //
S04bsu012_u:189: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇam upagṛhṇanti,
S04bsu012_u:196: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:197: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:199: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
S04bsu012_u:200: yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam anusmaret,
S04bsu012_u:204: janayiṣyati abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyas tīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān /
S04bsu012_u:205: sa ārogyasvalpābādho bhaviṣyati, na ca śakyate amanuṣyais tasya ojo 'pahartum //
S04bsu012_u:206_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma - śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda
S04bsu012_u:206_1: pattīyasi yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu012_u:207: athavā te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare?
S04bsu012_u:208: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
S04bsu012_u:209: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti tathāgatānām apariśuddhakāyavāṅbhanaḥsamudācāratā /
S04bsu012_u:210: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām,
S04bsu012_u:211: sa sumerur vā parvatarājaḥ sthānāc calet,
S04bsu012_u:212: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet /
S04bsu012_u:213: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:214: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyanti katham etan nāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti?
S04bsu012_u:215: te na śraddadhanti na pattīyanti, pratikṣipanti/
S04bsu012_u:216: teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāya na hitāya na sukhāya vinipātāy bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:222: yat tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi, tathāgatasyaiṣonubhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:223: abhūmir atra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān iti /
S04bsu012_u:227: tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryām apramāṇam,
S04bsu012_u:230: ākāṅkṣamāṇo 'haṃ tasya tathāgatasya kalpaṃ vā (BhgSū, Vaidya 171)
S04bsu012_u:233: na tv eva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistarāntam adhigantum //
S04bsu012_u:234: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyām eva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:235_0: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S04bsu012_u:235_1: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - bhaviṣyanti bhadanta
S04bsu012_u:235_2: bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā dīrghavyādhinā (kṣīṇagātrāḥ)
S04bsu012_u:236: kṣuttarṣābhyāṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhoṣṭhā maraṇābhimukhā rorudyamānebhir mitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣair ākarṣyamāṇāś ca /
S04bsu012_u:237: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratām upanīyate /
S04bsu012_u:238: yac ca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddham eva yat kiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu012_u:239: tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate /
S04bsu012_u:241: gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā tathājñāmājñāpayati /
S04bsu012_u:242: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:244: sthānam etad vidyate yat tasya tad vijñānaṃ punar api pratinivarteta,
S04bsu012_u:246: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime)
S04bsu012_u:247: divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punar api nivarteta,
S04bsu012_u:249: tasya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayam eva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:250: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpam akuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:251: tasmāc chrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā //
S04bsu012_u:252: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvam etad avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā?
S04bsu012_u:253: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:254: tais tasyāturasyārthāya sapta divasāni āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasitavyam,
S04bsu012_u:255: bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇair yathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu012_u:256: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam /
S04bsu012_u:260: ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:262: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate, veditavyaṃ sarvasaṃpaditi /
S04bsu012_u:264: punar aparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānām upadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:265: vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā (BhgSū, Vaidya 172)
S04bsu012_u:266: vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā samutthitā,
S04bsu012_u:267: amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhir vā vipad vā samupasthitā,
S04bsu012_u:268: tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
S04bsu012_u:270: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā /
S04bsu012_u:271_0: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato
S04bsu012_u:273: sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:274: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti /
S04bsu012_u:276: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya āyurvarṇabalārogyaiśvaryābhivṛddhir bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu012_u:277: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ bodhisattvam evam avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra parikṣīṇāyuḥ punar evābhivivardhate?
S04bsu012_u:278: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikāc chrutam - santi akālamaraṇāni /
S04bsu012_u:285: tṛtīyam akālamaraṇaṃ ye 'tīva pramattāḥ pramādavihāriṇaḥ, teṣāṃ manuṣyā ojo 'paharanti /
S04bsu012_u:286: caturtham akālamaraṇaṃ ye agnidāhena kālaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu012_u:287: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante /
S04bsu012_u:288: ṣaṣṭhakālamaraṇaṃ ye (siṃha)vyāghravyālacaṇḍamṛgamadhyagatā vāsaṃ kalpayanti mriyante ca /
S04bsu012_u:291: navamam akālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānam alabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu012_u:294: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ,
S04bsu012_u:306_0: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantam evam
S04bsu012_u:306_1: āhuḥ - śrutam asmābhiś ca bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya
S04bsu012_u:308: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:311: sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:313: nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:314: yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:320: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:321: yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatām anusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ //
S04bsu012_u:322: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ?
S04bsu012_u:324: bhagavān āha - tena hi ānanda dharmaparyāyam idaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaram iti dhāraya,
S04bsu012_u:334: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
